content: *note this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at thetrtletrunk com and the turtle trunk youtube channel the loopy coaster is a quick and easy crochet coaster pattern it features a puff variation that creates a fun texture make in a solid color or make it checkered this cool coaster is perfect for gifting making for your own home or selling at craft fairs and markets difficulty - easy finished size - 4 5 x 4 5 supplies needed medium 4 weight cotton yarn total of 23 yards 4 00mm g crochet hook yarn needle and scissors pattern language - english written in standard us terminology my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
